relatedModules.summary: This package provides an implementation for connecting and interacting with GraphQL endpoints.
This package provides an implementation for connecting and interacting with GraphQL endpoints.

records.name: __EnumValue
records.description: Represents a GraphQL enum.

fields.name: args
fields.description: The arguments needed to query the field

records.name: __Field
records.description: Represents a GraphQL field.

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: The string reperesentation of the default value of the input argument

records.name: __InputValue
records.description: Represents an input value for a GraphQL field.

fields.name: types
fields.description: The types defined in the GraphQL schema

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The root operation type of the GraphQL service

records.name: __Schema
records.description: Represents a GraphQL schema. This will be auto-generated when a service is attached to the GraphQL listener.

fields.name: fields
fields.description: The fields of the given type, if the type qaulifies to have fields

fields.name: enumValues
fields.description: The possible set of values, if the type is an enum

fields.name: ofType
fields.description: If the type is a `NON_NULL` or a `LIST`, the `__Type` of the wrapped type

fields.name: possibleTypes
fields.description:
The list of types that can be represented from this type. Only applies for the Union types, and
the the list can only contain object types

records.name: __Type
records.description: Represents a GraphQL type.

records.name: Data
records.description: Represents the data in an output object for a GraphQL query.

records.name: ErrorDetail
records.description: Represents the details of an error occurred during parsing, validating, or executing a GraphQL document.

fields.name: maxQueryDepth
fields.description: The maximum depth allowed for a query

records.name: GraphqlServiceConfiguration
records.description: Provides a set of configurations for the GraphQL service.

records.name: ListenerConfiguration
records.description: Provides a set of configurations for configure the underlying HTTP listener of the GraphQL listener.

records.name: ListenerHttp1Settings
records.description:
Provides settings related to HTTP/1.x protocol, when using HTTP 1.x as the underlying protocol for the GraphQL
service.

elementType.name: record {| ballerina/http:1.1.0-alpha8:CertValidationType type; int cacheSize; int cacheValidityPeriod; |}
record {| ballerina/http:1.1.0-alpha8:CertValidationType type; int cacheSize; int cacheValidityPeriod; |}

records.name: ListenerSecureSocket
records.description: Configures the SSL/TLS options to be used for the underlying HTTP service used in GraphQL service.

records.name: Location
records.description: Represents a location in a GraphQL document.

fields.name: data
fields.description: The corresponding data for a GraphQL request

fields.name: errors
fields.description: The errors occurred while processing a GraphQL request

records.name: OutputObject
records.description: Represents a GraphQL output object.

records.name: RequestLimitConfigs
records.description: Provides inbound request URI, total header and entity body size threshold configurations.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The path of the service to be hosted

returnParameters.description:
A `graphql:Error`, if an error occurred during the service attaching process or the schema
generation process, otherwise nil

lifeCycleMethods.name: attach
lifeCycleMethods.description: Attaches the provided service to the Listener.

parameters.name: listenTo
parameters.description: An `http:Listener` or a port number to listen for the GraphQL service

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: Configurations for the GraphQL service listener

returnParameters.description: A `graphql:Error` if the listener initialization is failed, otherwise nil

methods.name: init
methods.description:
Invoked during the initialization of a `graphql:Listener`. Either an `http:Listner` or a port number must be
provided to initialize the listener.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The path of the service to be hosted

returnParameters.description:
A `graphql:Error`, if an error occurred during the service attaching process or the schema
generation process, otherwise nil

methods.name: attach
methods.description: Attaches the provided service to the Listener.

returnParameters.description: A `graphql:Error`, if an error occurred during the service detaching process, otherwise nil

methods.name: detach
methods.description: Detaches the provided service from the Listener.

returnParameters.description: A `graphql:Error`, if an error occurred during the service starting process, otherwise nil
A `graphql:Error`, if an error occurred during the service stopping process, otherwise nil

methods.name: gracefulStop
methods.description: Gracefully stops the graphql listener. Already accepted requests will be served before the connection closure.

returnParameters.description: A `graphql:Error`, if an error occurred during the service stopping process, otherwise nil

methods.name: immediateStop
methods.description: Stops the service listener immediately. It is not implemented yet.

parameters.name: listenTo
parameters.description: An `http:Listener` or a port number to listen for the GraphQL service

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: Configurations for the GraphQL service listener

returnParameters.description: A `graphql:Error` if the listener initialization is failed, otherwise nil

initMethod.name: init
initMethod.description:
Invoked during the initialization of a `graphql:Listener`. Either an `http:Listner` or a port number must be
provided to initialize the listener.

returnParameters.description: A `graphql:Error`, if an error occurred during the service detaching process, otherwise nil

otherMethods.name: detach
otherMethods.description: Detaches the provided service from the Listener.

returnParameters.description: A `graphql:Error`, if an error occurred during the service starting process, otherwise nil
A `graphql:Error`, if an error occurred during the service stopping process, otherwise nil

otherMethods.name: gracefulStop
otherMethods.description: Gracefully stops the graphql listener. Already accepted requests will be served before the connection closure.

returnParameters.description: A `graphql:Error`, if an error occurred during the service stopping process, otherwise nil

otherMethods.name: immediateStop
otherMethods.description: Stops the service listener immediately. It is not implemented yet.

annotations.name: ServiceConfiguration
annotations.description: The annotation to configure a GraphQL service.

errors.description: Represents any error related to the Ballerina GraphQL module

types.description: Represents the supported Scalar types in Ballerina GraphQL module

enums.description: Represents the type kind of a GraphQL type.
